answers.answer: Me too. I go in at 8am and I'm so nervous!
How far are you? And if you don't mind why? I really wanna see my little one too? I'm 36 weeks
Btw good luck :) you will be fine ;)
Let me know how it goes please as I might have to be induced next week and I'm scared if so

Okay when I got induced I was 38 weeks. Bubz was not ready to come lol it took 3 days for him to finally make his way out! 1st day they put gel in my vagina to help soften cervix (didn't work) next day they put a pill up there (no progress that day) 3rd day they were able to break my waters at 9 am.  At 12 they pumped me with pitocin and at 3 he was born! Inductions are typically faster because the pitocin is pretty much making your body have contractions although the contractions are far more worse. I had no pain relief whatsoever, if u can do it so can you!! Good luck babe. Ask as much questions if you need advice xx

I'm 37 weeks, I'm being induced because of my blood pressure and I have gestational diabetes. My son is much safer out than in. I'm super nervous about the induction method, I hate when my OB checks for dilation, let alone stick thing up there.
I agree I hate even being checked if I'm dialed just to awkward and uncomfortable for me. Haha but I will most likely be getting induced next week. Scared as hell :(

question: I'm being induced tonight , I'm very nervous.  Any suggestions?
title: Being induced
